    AIDevKit

    AIDevKit empowers beginner developers to effortlessly integrate advanced AI functionalities directly into Unity, dramatically simplifying your game development workflow.

    With just a few clicks and simple text prompts, you can create code, generate images, produce sound effects, and even synthesize voices. AIDevKit offers broad API integrations, rich editor tools, extensive voice synthesis options, and unique audio generation capabilities.

    ‚ú® Features

    üí¨ Interactive AI Assistant

    Chat directly with an integrated AI-powered assistant within the Unity Editor. Ask anything from "How do I fix this error?" to "What scripts do I need for character jumping?" The assistant provides clear explanations, coding tips, and even edits existing scripts on command, simplifying your coding process.

    üé® Image & Texture Generation

    Generate detailed textures, sprites, icons, and concept art directly from descriptive text prompts using cutting-edge AI like DALL¬∑E and Stable Diffusion. Just input something like "Pixel art icon of a magic sword with blue flames," and receive high-quality assets instantly ready to use.

    üîä Sound Effects Creation

    Quickly create custom sound effects with simple text prompts like "Gentle forest background sounds with birds and wind." AIDevKit enables you to effortlessly create audio effects tailored exactly to your game‚Äôs atmosphere, saving time and resources.

    üó£Ô∏è Speech-to-Text (STT) & Text-to-Speech (TTS)

    Easily implement voice commands and speech recognition, transforming spoken words into game actions. Additionally, use advanced text-to-speech to generate natural-sounding voices for dialogues and narrations in multiple languages, eliminating the need for expensive voice recordings.

    üéôÔ∏è Voice Changer & Audio Isolation

    Enhance your audio assets further with built-in tools for voice modulation (e.g., creating robotic or monster voices) and background noise removal. Perfect for enriching character interactions and improving voice chat quality.

    üõ°Ô∏è AI Content Moderation

    Automatically detect and moderate inappropriate text content in player-generated dialogues or chats, keeping your game environment safe and friendly. Integrated seamlessly via OpenAI‚Äôs moderation API.

    üåê Extensive AI API Support

    AIDevKit uniquely integrates multiple AI providers into one unified system‚ÄîOpenAI‚Äôs GPT-4 and DALL¬∑E, Google Gemini, ElevenLabs for advanced voice synthesis, and Mubert for AI-generated music. Enjoy maximum flexibility to choose and combine services best suited to your game‚Äôs needs.

    üõ†Ô∏è Powerful Editor Tools

    Intuitive Unity Editor interface for accessing all AI features without any complicated setup. Easily manage prompts, view AI-generated assets, and tweak settings through dedicated, beginner-friendly panels.

    üöÄ Runtime Integration & Cross-Platform Compatibility

    Use AI features seamlessly in your finished games, not just in the editor. Dynamically generate NPC dialogues, custom names, or sounds at runtime. Fully compatible with all Unity-supported platforms (PC, mobile, consoles).

    üß† Supported APIs

    • OpenAI: Chat Completions, Realtime, Audio, Embeddings, Fine-tuning, Files, Uploads, Images, Models, Moderations, Assistants (Pro only), Completions (legacy)
    • Google: Text Generation, Image Generation, Files, Tuning, Embeddings
    • ElevenLabs: Text to Speech, Speech to Text, Voice Changer, Voice Isolator, Sound Effects, Voices, Voice Library

    More API integrations are on the way: Have something you'd like to see next? Let us know via Discord ‚Äî your feedback shapes the roadmap.

    üíª Supported Platforms

    Windows, OSX, Linux, Unity WebGL, iOS, Android, Windows Phone/Store, PlayStation, Xbox, PS Vita/PSM, Switch
